slides.quote: Like the Stage Manager in Thornton Wilder's 'Our Town' - an omniscient narrator who knows everyone, sees all connections, and can tell the story from any angle.

slides.caption: The agent operates across all 5 layers simultaneously

slides.title: Multi-Perspective Memory
bullets: Same event, different tellings â†’  Richer truth
Sarah: 'I saw Janice and John talking - that connection...'
Josh: 'I spent the night keeping servers alive...'
Agent synthesizes: 'Pseudo's launch was pure Silicon Alley...'

slides.title: Why This Matters
bullets: This is a blueprint for AI-native oral history
Every community could have an agent like this:
â€¢ Early hip-hop in the Bronx
â€¢ Women in tech, LGBTQ+ history
Not history in a database. History in a conversation.
